content: page 1 of 2 perfect picnic headband by ruth brasch notes - this pattern uses us crochet terminology - do not replace the initial chain circle with a magic_ring this is your buttonhole to fasten the headband when it s done - yarn requirement is given for the largest size model has a 23 5 head smaller sizes will require less materials - crochet hook size us h 5 0 mm - 80 yards 74 meters of fingering weight yarn or 40 yards 37 meters of dk weight yarn - 1 button approximately 1 1 25 cm in diameter - tapestry needle to sew on button stitches & abbreviations double_crochet = double_crochet yo insert hook into next st yo summer is the perfect time to relax outside and pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops twice enjoy a little lunch or dinner decrease = double_crochet 2 together yo insert the sun a breeze and a snack hook into next st yo pul up a loop yo pull through 2 this headband is the perfect accessory to help keep loops twice yo pull through all three loops on hook 1 your hair out of your eyes st decreased while you re on a summer adventure etss = end tss worked in the last stitch of a row it s size adjustable so it will work for all ages only insert hook into two loops of last stitch yarn over pull up a loop from newborn through adults or could even be retp = return pass yo pull through 1 loop on hook lengthened into a belt yo pull through 2 loops on hook to end of row one loop remains on the hook slip_stitch = slip_stitch insert hook into indicated stitch yarn over pull through both loops on hook gauge 4 sts / 4 row = 1 in pattern stitch st s = stitch es tss = tunisian simple stitch insert hook from right to left in next vertical bar yarn over pull up a loop average head circumferences tss2tog = tunisian simple stitch two together insert please note these are head sizes not finished hook from right to left under next 2 vertical bars yarn headband lengths over pull up one loop 1 st decreased - preemie 12 30 5 cm yo = yarn over wrap yarn over hook from front to - newborn 14 35 5 cm back - 6 months 16 40 5 cm - 1-2 years 18 46 cm - 3-5 years 19 48 cm - 6-9 years 20 55 cm - teen/adult s 21 53 5 cm -
